name: ScriptMenuActions

properties.name: length
properties.description: The number of objects in the collection.

parameters.name: title
parameters.description: The name of the ScriptMenuAction for display in the user interface. The title includes any ampersand characters (&), which are used to tell the Windows OS to underline the following character in the name for use with the Alt key to navigate to a menu item. Double ampersands are used to display an actual ampersand character in the name. The Mac OS ignores and removes the extra ampersand characters. (Optional)

parameters.name: withProperties
parameters.description: Initial values for properties of the new ScriptMenuAction (Optional)

methods.name: count
methods.description: Displays the number of elements in the ScriptMenuAction.

methods.name: item
methods.description: Returns the ScriptMenuAction with the specified index or name.

parameters.name: index
parameters.description: The index or name. Can accept: Long Integer or String.

methods.name: itemByName
methods.description: Returns the ScriptMenuAction with the specified name.

methods.name: itemByID
methods.description: Returns the ScriptMenuAction with the specified ID.

methods.name: itemByRange
methods.description: Returns the ScriptMenuActions within the specified range.

parameters.name: from
parameters.description: The ScriptMenuAction, index, or name at the beginning of the range. Can accept: ScriptMenuAction, Long Integer or String.

parameters.name: to
parameters.description: The ScriptMenuAction, index, or name at the end of the range. Can accept: ScriptMenuAction, Long Integer or String.

methods.name: firstItem
methods.description: Returns the first ScriptMenuAction in the collection.

methods.name: lastItem
methods.description: Returns the last ScriptMenuAction in the collection.

methods.name: middleItem
methods.description: Returns the middle ScriptMenuAction in the collection.

methods.name: previousItem
methods.description: Returns the ScriptMenuAction with the index previous to the specified index.

parameters.name: obj
parameters.description: The index of the ScriptMenuAction that follows the desired ScriptMenuAction.

methods.name: nextItem
methods.description: Returns the ScriptMenuAction whose index follows the specified ScriptMenuAction in the collection.

parameters.name: obj
parameters.description: The ScriptMenuAction whose index comes before the desired ScriptMenuAction.

methods.name: anyItem
methods.description: Returns any ScriptMenuAction in the collection.

methods.name: everyItem
methods.description: Returns every ScriptMenuAction in the collection.

methods.name: toSource
methods.description: Generates a string which, if executed, will return the ScriptMenuAction.
Returns the ScriptMenuAction with the specified index.

description: A collection of script menu actions.
